title: Can't use the boards
body: Keep saying I need to be over level 7 to use the boards, even though I've been 30 for a couple of weeks now, is there any confirmation or anything I need to do to access the boards properly?

replies.body: Yea sometimes these levels get a little out of whack. Luckily, posting here in H&S or using the Syncing Tool at the top of H&S will get things updated!
